module.p:
-te is a suffix used to create derived adjectives from verbs.
crìoch end, boundary ⇒ crìochnaich finish, end, complete ⇒ crìochnaichte finished, completed
(mì-thoil disinclination ⇒ ) mì-thoilich displease ⇒ mì-thoilichte displeased, unhappy
mì-threòraich misguide, misleed ⇒ mì-threòraichte misguided, misled
stèidhich
base, establish, found ⇒ stèidhichte
established, founded, based
